text: The men's 800 metres event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 16, 17 and 19 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Benson Koech ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Lee Jin-Il ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Brendan Hanigan ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 19 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
